text: Giorgos Pamlidis (, born 13 November 1993) is a Greek professional footballer who plays as a forward for Super League club PAS Giannina. ==Career== Pamlidis started his career from a local amateur team from Pieria, Thermaikos Korinos. On August 28, 2013, he signed for Footaball League 2 club Achilleas Neokaisareia. After 1 year, he gained the attention of Super League club Ergotelis and within a month's trial, he signed a 5-years contract with the Cretan team. On January 30, 2015, he was given on loan to AE Larissa till the end of the season 2014–15. On 28 December 2015, Pamlidis reportedly signed for Football League side Kerkyra, after legally filing for his contract with Ergotelis to be terminated, due to unpaid wages. He was officially announced by Kerkyra on 7 January 2016. ==References== ==External links== * gazzetta.gr * superleaguegreece.net Category:1993 births Category:Living people Category:Sportspeople from Katerini Category:Greek footballers Category:Super League Greece 2 players Category:Ergotelis F.C. players Category:AE Larissa FC players Category:PAE Kerkyra players Category:PAS Giannina F.C. players Category:Association football forwards
title: Giorgos Pamlidis
